title: Drowned Sorrow
description: Megan Blackwood has just lost her son in a terrible accident. Now she has come to Moonlight Creek with her teenage daughter Jenna, hoping a change of scenery might help to put her life back together.But something odd is going on in Moonlight Creek.When rain falls over the village, its inhabitants commit grisly murders, leaving the place deserted with the first rays of sunshine.Beneath the lake's surface, an eerie presence watches... and waits... Waits to reveal a tragic past drowned in mystery and fear. One that doesn't bode well for visitors.By the time Megan realizes that her daughter's life is in danger, it may be too late to escape."Vanessa Morgan has the gift of pacing and spookiness" Scott Nicholson, author of They Hunger and The Farm"The female version of Stephen King" Pedro Chaves, director of Reiki"A racy thriller in the vein of Dean Koontz and John Saul" Dirk Vandereyken, author of Fates Worse Than Hunter
author: Vanessa  Morgan
